title: Couple With Heart Man No Skin Tone Man Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic relationship between two men, with one man having a medium-light skin tone. It symbolizes love, partnership, and commitment.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two men standing close, their forms rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading. A vibrant red heart, glowing with realistic lighting and a glossy finish, floats between them, symbolizing a deep connection and love. The medium-light skin tone on one figure is depicted with a smooth gradient, conveying warmth and inclusivity in Apple's inclusive emoji set, often used to represent romantic relationships and affection.
